item.title: Good Smile Company Launches HELLO! GOOD SMILE Line and Exclusives at New York Comic Con 2021
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:

The post Good Smile Company Launches HELLO! GOOD SMILE Line and Exclusives at New York Comic Con 2021 appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The amazing Good Smile Company is celebrating their 20th anniversary! With New York Comic Con marking its return to live events at the Javtis Center, Good Smile Company is set to launch their new figure line titled, “HELLO! GOOD SMILE”!

New York Comic Con Booth

So come stop by and say hello to Good Smile Company at their booth, #1419! You’ll be able to preview the latest Nendoroid, POP UP PARADE, and figma sculpts. This is a must-see for anyone interested in collecting figures of all shapes, sizes, and types of various characters from their favorite anime and video games.

HELLO! GOOD SMILE: Hatsune Miku

And for the Vocaloid enthusiasts like ourselves, we’re happy to say the adorable Hatsune Miku is going to be released as a part of the HELLO! GOOD SMILE line in a special ice cream-themed display! You’ll also get the opportunity to take home a special HELLO! GOOD SMILE themed keychain.

NYCC 2021 Exclusive

Additionally, Good Smile Company will have a limited quantity of special Naruto Nendoroid Pin (Black & White Version) available for purchase!

Other character goods from series such as Cardcaptor Sakura, Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure, and My Hero Academia are also going to be available, alongside merchandise from For Fans By Fans. Make sure to take a look while supplies last!

This year, New York Comic Con will run from October 7-10, 2021, at the Jarvis Center.
For tickets, check out https://www.newyorkcomiccon.com/ !
